content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To get started, may I have your name please?
Uh, I’m Gloria. I think… yes, Gloria Martin.
Thank you, Gloria! Can you please provide your address so we know where to send our technician?
Oh, sure. 224 East Willow Avenue. Uh… I think that’s right. Yes, it is.
Thank you! And just to confirm, that’s 224 East Willow Avenue. Is that in town here? I’ll check if you’re in our service area.
Great, you’re within our service area! Can you tell me a bit about the issue you’re having? Is this for heating, air conditioning, or something else?
It’s my air – uh, the AC is just blowing warm air, I think. I’m not sure if it’s on, really. It’s too hot in here.
Thank you for letting us know, Gloria. We’ll help get your AC working again! What’s a good date and time for a technician to come by? Do you need this taken care of as soon as possible?
Um, I’m home all today and tomorrow too. Maybe this afternoon? I really don’t like this heat. Is that too soon?
This afternoon sounds doable! I’ll check our team’s availability for later today. Please hold on just a moment.
We have a technician available between 2:00 and 4:00 PM today. Does that window work for you?
Yes, that’s okay. I’ll be here. So someone will come to check it? Do I need to do anything?
Thank you, Gloria! You don’t need to do anything else—our technician will arrive between 2:00 and 4:00 PM today to check your AC. Would you like a text reminder before their arrival?
